title: cgo: sanitizers test causes a crash when building Go on Red Hat 4.4.7-11
body:
Trying to build Go from source (current master branch) on Red Hat Linux 4.4.7-11 (gcc version 4.4.7 20120313) with src/all.bash results in a crash during cgo tests:

\##### ../misc/cgo/testshared
PASS
ok      _/localdisk/sarseev/gointel/golang/misc/cgo/testshared  10.066s

\##### ../misc/cgo/testasan

\##### ../misc/cgo/testsanitizers
\# runtime/msan
cc1: error: unrecognized command line option "-fsanitize=memory"
FAIL: msan
\# runtime/msan
cc1: error: unrecognized command line option "-fsanitize=memory"
FAIL: msan2
2015/10/27 14:02:27 Failed: exit status 1
